tool_description: A list of top 250 medications, devided by categories
name: top250Drugs
title: top250Drugs

api_list.name: getDocsPsychaitric
api_list.description: Get a list of medications in category "Psychaitric Drugs"

api_list.name: getDocsRespiratory
api_list.description: Get a list of medications in category "Respiratory Drugs"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top250drugs.p.rapidapi.com/respiratory"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top250drugs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
